boardgame.name: Empires of the Void II
boardgame.description: The Kurross Empire emerged from the deep, endless pool of space, dark and undetectable. They crushed Earth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s paltry fleet within a week, and broke through the great planetary shield that protected the surface. Bright blue oceans turned to an irradiated wasteland as they bombarded the planet, shredding the remnants of thousands of years of human history. Markan, last captain of Earth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s forces, made a final, desperate attempt to survive, salvaging an abandoned Worldship from hundreds of years past. She took command and headed for the fringe of the galaxy, where there was a chance to gain a foothold, grow in strength, and find new allies for the fight against the Kurross. Earth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s long-time enemies, the Zun and Decima Empires, soon followed in their own Worldships, leaving behind decimated worlds and lost family, determined to stake their own claim of the fringe._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Empires of the Void II, you have been given a mission to establish a foothold at the fringe of the galaxy for your galactic empire. The game begins when your massive Worldships reach the fringe, where you must explore, wage war, use diplomacy, and construct buildings to gain victory. The fringe is sparsely populated and the few local sentient species are struggling to survive, leaving huge regions of planets open for exploration and colonization. Many species are eager to ally themselves with a powerful empire to gain security and stability in a chaotic and difficult time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As you explore and interact with planets, you will discover unfolding stories of the fringe. Each inhabited planet is home to a unique alien species, with their own goals, values, and problems. Will you give aid by fighting off pirates, transporting goods, and curing strange diseases? Or will you invade and rule with a cruel hand? This may be your last chance to prepare before the Kurross meet you again._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Pre-order : Estimated delivery December 2017 EotV II Kickstarter Deluxe Edition. For a true Red Raven Games Enthusiast! Including: - 40 Triangular Metal Coins - Art and Sketch Book _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;The making of Empires of the Void II_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; - Fusion Beast Miniature - Cloth Goods Bag + - All unlocked Stretch Goals

I need the money more than I need the game - up for sale is my pre-shipped Kickstarter pledge at the Empires of the Void II Deluxe. Shipping has already been paid, and as such I can only ship domestically. I prefer payment methods that do not charge a fee to the buyer or seller, such as Venmo or Amazon.com gift card. PayPal offers a feeless payment system (Send Money to Friends - you can be the judge on whether applying this system to a BGG purchase is OK in your book), but if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to use Paypal Pay For Goods I would ask you to cover their fee. Empires of the Void II Deluxe - Kickstarter Reward Level - all stretch goals and metal coins included!

*** PREORDER WITH EXPECTED DELIVERY Q1 2018*** Contents: Kickstarter Deluxed Edition of Empires of the Void II Board Game. Includes the core game, metal coins, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Making Of_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; booklet, Fusian Beast Miniature, and cloth bag. Please note: unless otherwise stated paid add ons from the Kickstarter Campaign are not included.

Deluxe Edition of Empires of the Void II! with: Triangular Metal Coins (40 coins: 30 one-value, 10 five-value) The Making of Empires of the Void II Book (a 32-page booklet filled with art and sketches, describing the design process of Empires of the Void II) Fusian Beast Miniature
Kickstarter deluxe edition new in shrink. *******FREE SHIPPING!!***********

Kickstarter Empires of the Void II Deluxe Edition with all Stretch Goals (in shrink). Payment via Bank Transfer (IBAN and BIC) or PayPal (friends _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; family). Shipping cost for: Germany 5,99€. Rest of Europe 20€.

Deluxe Edition of Empires of the Void II from Kickstarter including all exclusives: Triangular Metal Coins (40 coins: 30 one-value, 10 five-value) The Making of Empires of the Void II Book (a 32-page booklet filled with art and sketches, describing the design process of Empires of the Void II) Fusian Beast Miniature Sealed in perfect condition. £80 inc. P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P in UK and PayPal fees. Request for P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P for worldwide. Can arrange for delivery in London, UK and surrounding areas.

*DELUXE KICKSTARTER EDITION* The Deluxe Edition includes everything in the standard edition plus: Triangular Metal Coins (40 coins: 30 one-value, 10 five-value) The Making of Empires of the Void II Book (a 32-page booklet filled with art and sketches, describing the design process of Empires of the Void II) Fusian Beast Miniature

Deluxe Edition of Empires of the Void II with: Metal coins, Fusian Beast minature, cloth goods bag and designer diary book. Item is still in shrink Preferred shipping is with postnl (local dutch carrier), but can provide postage cost on request for DHL. Expected postage cost: pick up in Purmerend - Free Shipping with postnl in Netherlands for 6,50 EUR Shipping with postnl in most of Europe for 19,50 EUR - please request exact code or check yourself on https://www.postnl.nl/en/ Payment via Bank Transfer (IBAN and BIC) or PayPal (friends _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; family)
Kickstarter Edition with all stretch goals (except metal coins). Unpunched. Shipping included.

Mint, but opened and bagged...this is the KS Deluxe (with the metal coins/etc.) and i purchased it from the orig KS backer...and he listed it pointing out that when the game arrived the box cover had 2 split corners/rips...then when the game arrived i taped the 2 corners (after all, my games spend most their time sitting on my shelves and the box corners don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t affect the game play) and bagged all the counters in prem. bags...after all that, my wife watched the videos and decided she wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t interested (smile)...so here we are... This listing is about 45%-50% below what the KS Deluxe game should sell for, if it didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have the 2 cover corners taped/torn...and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s already punched and bagged for you! So if you can live with a slightly defective box cover this is for you! S/H will be $13.99 ((unless you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re on the west coast/pacific northwest...in that case BGG email me your complete address and i will get right back to you with exact s/h)
